info.description: A request for a service to be performed
info.title: FHIR R4 ServiceRequest Resource

ServiceRequest.description: A request for a service to be performed

doNotPerform.description: True if service/procedure should not be performed

encounter.description: Encounter in which the request was created

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

intent.description: proposal | plan | directive | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option

status.description: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown

subject.description: Individual or Entity the service is ordered for

text.description: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

coding.description: Code defined by a terminology system

text.description: Plain text representation of the concept

identifier.description: Logical reference, when literal reference is not known

reference.description: Literal reference, Relative, internal or absolute URL

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

url.description: identifies the meaning of the extension

assigner.description: Organization that issued id (may be just text)

period.description: Time period when id is/was valid for use

system.description: The namespace for the identifier value

use.description: usual | official | temp | secondary | old (If known)

lastUpdated.description: When the resource version last changed

profile.description: Profiles this resource claims to conform to

security.description: Security Labels applied to this resource

source.description: Identifies where the resource comes from

end.description: End time with inclusive boundary, if not ongoing

system.description: System that defines coded unit form

code.description: Symbol in syntax defined by the system

userSelected.description: If this coding was chosen directly by the user

version.description: Version of the system - if relevant

country.description: Country (e.g. can be ISO 3166 2 or 3 letter code)

line.description: Street name, number, direction & P.O. Box etc.

period.description: Time period when address was/is in use

use.description: home | work | temp | old | billing - purpose of this address

contentType.description: Mime type of the content, with charset etc.

size.description: Number of bytes of content (if url provided)

title.description: Label to display in place of the data

url.description: Uri where the data can be found

name.description: Name of an individual to contact

telecom.description: Contact details for individual or organization

period.description: Time period when the contact point was/is in use

rank.description: Specify preferred order of use (1 = highest)

system.description: phone | fax | email | pager | url | sms | other

use.description: home | work | temp | old | mobile - purpose of this contact point

mustSupport.description: Indicates specific structure elements that are referenced by the knowledge module

profile.description: The profile of the required data

type.description: The type of the required data

description.description: Natural language description of the condition

name.description: Short name assigned to expression for reuse

given.description: Given names (not always 'first'). Includes middle names

period.description: Time period when name was/is in use

prefix.description: Parts that come before the name

suffix.description: Parts that come after the name

text.description: Text representation of the full name

use.description: usual | official | temp | nickname | anonymous | old | maiden

documentation.description: A brief description of the parameter

name.description: Name used to access the parameter value

profile.description: What profile the value is expected to be

display.description: Brief description of the related artifact

type.description: documentation | justification | citation | predecessor | successor | derived-from | depends-on | composed-of

url.description: Where the artifact can be accessed

dimensions.description: Number of sample points at each time point

factor.description: Multiply data by this before adding to origin

data.description: The actual signature content (XML DigSig. JWS, picture, etc.)

sigFormat.description: The technical format of the signature

targetFormat.description: The technical format of the signed resources

type.description: Indication of the reason the entity signed the object(s)

name.description: Name or URI that identifies the event

type.description: named-event | periodic | data-changed | data-added | data-modified | data-removed | data-accessed | data-access-ended

countMax.description: Maximum number of times to repeat

dayOfWeek.description: mon | tue | wed | thu | fri | sat | sun

durationUnit.description: s | min | h | d | wk | mo | a - unit of time (UCUM)

frequency.description: Event occurs frequency times per period

frequencyMax.description: Event occurs up to frequencyMax times per period

period.description: Event occurs frequency times per period

periodUnit.description: s | min | h | d | wk | mo | a - unit of time (UCUM)

when.description: Code for time period of occurrence

path.description: A code-valued attribute to filter on

searchParam.description: A coded (token) parameter to search on

path.description: A date-valued attribute to filter on

searchParam.description: A date valued parameter to search on

path.description: The name of the attribute to perform the sort

type.description: The kind of dose or rate specified

parameters.name: authored
parameters.description: When request transitioned to being actionable

parameters.name: based-on
parameters.description: The service request this appointment is allocated to assess

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: product-problem | product-quality | product-use-error | wrong-dose | incorrect-prescribing-information | wrong-technique | wrong-route-of-administration | wrong-rate | wrong-duration | wrong-time | expired-drug | medical-device-use-error | problem-different-manufacturer | unsafe-physical-environment

parameters.name: occurrence
parameters.description: When the charged service was applied

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The entity that caused the expenses

parameters.name: performer
parameters.description: Matches if the practitioner is listed as a performer in any of the "simple" activities.  (For performers of the detailed activities, chain through the activitydetail search parameter.)

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The entity that caused the expenses
